invite_reference.message_filler:
Hi {{name}},

In case we haven't already said it‚Ä¶we really love having you as a customer. So much so that we‚Äôd like to invite you to join our VIP inner circle and put your insights to work helping us and others better understand {{organization}}‚Äôs real value.

What do you get in the VIP circle?

ü§ù Networking opportunities with other industry leaders
üìû The chance to share your insights directly with prospects
üí° The ability to shape the service and make it even better for you
üí∞ Gift card rewards and donations to the causes you care about

Yep. All for just showing off your expertise.

360_quote_skip_title: Creating a quote greatly helps us with new customers.
360_quote_skip_subtitle: A quote from you carries huge credibility, and can make the difference in the decision-making process for potential clients. We encourage you to take a few moments to share your thoughts in a short quote.
360_review_skip_title: Creating a review greatly helps us with new customers.
360_review_skip_subtitle: A review from you carries huge credibility, and can make a difference in the decision-making process for other professionals like yourself. We encourage you to take a few moments to share your thoughts in a short review.

360_addon_Frequency_description:
Select the number of times you would like to take a reference call.
 This indicates your availability to speak with prospective clients.
360_addon_Webinars_description: Webinars are a great way to showcase your expertise, gather a professional network, and contribute to the success of the product.
360_addon_PublicSpeaking_description: Public speaking can enhance your credibility, increase your visibility, and establish you as an expert in your field while promoting the product.
360_addon_ProductFeedback_description: Provide early-access feedback on new features before they are released and help influence our product roadmap.
360_addon_AdvisoryBoard_description: Be interviewed by the press and use media coverage to promote how you are transforming your organization with the help of our products/services.
360_addon_SocialPresence_description: Whether via posts, live sessions or a white-paper - Sharing your knowledge publicly is a point of impact.
360_addon_RoundTable_description: A roundtable, both on site or virtual, is an opportunity to share your experience and influence others.
360_addon_Podcast_description: Whether as a guest or as a host, particpating in a podcast can help others become inspired by your authentic experience.
360_addon_FirstToKnow_description: Help us evaluate new ideas, capabilities and features prior to their official launch.
360_addon_InterViews_description: Whether live or recorded, participating in an interview helps us share the uniqueness of our experience with the relevant professional community.
360_addon_CollaborationNewProducts_descr: Engage customers in the process of developing new products or services to ensure that we meet their needs.
360_addon_header: Influence others with your knowledge. Please check the activities you like.

requested_contribution_email_body.CaseSt:
Hi {{referenceName}},
We've been thrilled to have you with us and noticed that you've enjoyed our services. 
We know how impactful your experience is, which is why we have a quick favor to ask. 
Would you be up to sharing your user journey with us?  
It won‚Äôt take more than 5 minutes!

requested_contribution_email_body.VideoT:
Hi {{referenceName}},
We've been thrilled to have you with us and noticed that you've enjoyed our services. 
We know how impactful your experience is, which is why we have a little favor to ask. 
Would you be up to sharing a quick video testimonial about your experience with us? 
It won‚Äôt take more than 5 minutes!

Your words help us improve & show others what we're all about, so we would really appreciate it.

We're really excited to hear your thoughts and continue this awesome journey together.
Thanks a bunch!

Best regards,
{{vendorName}}
{{title}}
{{email}}
requested_contribution_email_body.g2Revi:
Hello {{referenceName}},

We hope this message finds you well. As a valued member of our community, your experiences with our services are incredibly important to us ‚Äì and to others considering our offerings.

Would you be willing to share your thoughts in a G2 review? Your honest feedback not only helps us grow and improve but also guides others in making informed decisions.

Sharing your review won't take much time, and it means the world to us. Your perspective is a vital part of our journey together.

Thank you for considering this request. We're excited to hear about your experiences!

Warm regards,

{{companyName}}
